text: @Jim_Jordan As someone who just won the battle with coronavirus I’d like to say to your response!! EAT SHIT & DIE JIM YOU OLD VOYER OF BOYS GETTING RAPED! Did you like it? Watching those boys? Corona will find you all! I can’t wait !!
